title: Will the iPhone 12 detect when you don't need 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: That's not quite how it works. 5G will only be used when it's there, if Apple have implemented the software correctly you should be able to limit the connection to a maximum of 4G is you want to. If not, the system will search for 5G as it polls the network in the same way it searches for all the other connection types.

Q: Will the iPhone 12 detect when you don't need 5G? A: Maybe You will only get 5G is you update/upgrade your cell contract for 5G service otherwise you will only get 4GThe iPhone 12 will automatically use the best connection technology that it can get a reliable signal from
